parameters.name: ClusterIds
parameters.description: The cluster IDs. Number of elements in the array: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: ClusterStates
parameters.description: The states of the clusters. Number of elements in the array: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: ClusterTypes
parameters.description: The list of cluster types. Number of elements in the array: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The starting point of the current query. If you do not configure this parameter, the query starts from the beginning.

parameters.name: PaymentTypes
parameters.description: The billing methods. You can specify a maximum of 2 items.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tag list. Number of elements in the array: 1 to 20.
